extension.name: tintico
extension.author: David Toro Triana
extension.description: Automatically appends the "Buy me a Coffee" Crowdfounding Platform button at the end of Joomla articles.

field.name: custom_code
field.label: Custom Code
field.description: Insert your HTML + JavaScript code here.

field.name: categories
field.label: Target Categories
field.description: Select the article categories where the plugin should appear.

field.name: categories
field.label: Target Categories
field.description: Select one or more categories where the plugin should display.
field.query: SELECT id AS value, title AS text FROM #__categories WHERE extension = 'com_content' AND published = 1 ORDER BY title ASC
